name: Riqueza en la Muerte
description:
Prototype and Submission for the May Day 1.0 Game Jam!

This is our first game made by our team, and we learned a lot making it, we look foward improve this proyect and work on future releases.

Description: 

You are a Spanish Explorer, that got trapped in an ancient temple by the God of Death, now you must escape this place. But dont worry, death is not the end, as it will send you straight to the underworld, and you must fight your way back to the land of the living. If you die on the underworld, is game over.

With our submission we attempted to aproach the Jam's theme in a creative way. We look foward to work on this project.

Controls:

  • WASD /Left Joystick to move
  • Left Click/ Left button to attack
  • R/ Left bumper to roll

Team:

  • Rafael Tamayo
  • Sebastian Baez
  • Ricardo Garcia
  • Manuel Moreno
